name: Swamp Stew
description:
swamp stew

You've been cursed and turned into a pig, but nothing your abuela can't fix! Explore her swamp, meet the other residents, and find roots for her stew. Maybe then she'll undo the curse... or just make it worse!

Controls
  • WASD /Arrow Keys : Move
  • E : Talk / Read / Close dialog
  • G : Dig for roots (as pig)
  • C : Change creature (when available)
Credits

Made in 48-ish Hours for Global Game Jam 2023

Aaron Z. Best (Twitter) - Programming, Sign Writing, & Voice of George

Francisco Gonzalez (Twitter) - Art, Writing, & Voice of The Witch

Gautam Srikishan (Twitter) - Music, Sound, & a little art

Ivy Dupler (Twitter) - Art, Writing, Voice Over Direction, & Voice of Muffin

Ruthie Edwards (Twitter) - Art, Level Design, UI Design, & Voice of Cynthia
